title: The messy history of America's asylum policy
description: From the SS St. Louis in World War II, to President Trump's detention policies, America has a messy history when it comes to granting asylum. Professor Carl Bon Tempo explains.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
